message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but my offer is fairer considering the decreasing value of the money. Let's settle this now.
I see you're willing to compromise, let's meet in the middle of our previous offers.
Alice, this is a very serious offer. The value of the money is slipping away with each round.  We're very close to a fair deal - let's end this here.
